reviews.subject: Biology
reviews.review: Dr. Johnson's lectures are engaging and well-structured. She explains complex concepts clearly.

reviews.subject: Computer Science
reviews.review: Fantastic professor! Prof. Lee's passion for coding is contagious. His projects are challenging but rewarding.

reviews.subject: Psychology
reviews.review: Dr. Martinez knows her subject well, but sometimes struggles to keep the class engaged.

reviews.subject: History
reviews.review: Prof. Wilson brings history to life with his storytelling. His exams are tough but fair.

reviews.subject: Chemistry
reviews.review: Dr. Chen is an amazing educator. Her lab sessions are well-organized and informative.

reviews.subject: Mathematics
reviews.review: Prof. Brown's teaching style is too fast-paced. It's hard to keep up with the material.

reviews.subject: English Literature
reviews.review: Dr. Taylor's passion for literature is evident. Her feedback on essays is very helpful.

reviews.subject: Physics
reviews.review: Prof. Nelson knows his stuff, but his lectures can be dry at times. Office hours are helpful.

reviews.subject: Sociology
reviews.review: Dr. Garcia's classes are thought-provoking and interactive. She encourages great discussions.

reviews.subject: Economics
reviews.review: Prof. Wright explains complex economic theories in an understandable way. His real-world examples are great.

reviews.subject: Art History
reviews.review: Dr. Kim's lectures are like virtual museum tours. Her enthusiasm for art is infectious.

reviews.subject: Environmental Science
reviews.review: Prof. Green's field trips are informative, but his lectures can be a bit disorganized.

reviews.subject: Political Science
reviews.review: Dr. Parker facilitates great debates in class. Her assignments encourage critical thinking.

reviews.subject: Music Theory
reviews.review: Prof. Scott seems knowledgeable, but his teaching methods are confusing for beginners.

reviews.subject: Anthropology
reviews.review: Dr. Adams brings anthropology to life with her field experience. Her classes are always engaging.

reviews.subject: Philosophy
reviews.review: Prof. Lee challenges students to think deeply. His Socratic method can be intimidating but effective.

reviews.subject: Neuroscience
reviews.review: Dr. White's research is cutting-edge, but her lectures can be hard to follow sometimes.

reviews.subject: Marketing
reviews.review: Prof. Turner's real-world marketing experience adds tremendous value to his classes.

reviews.subject: Linguistics
reviews.review: Dr. Rodriguez makes language study fascinating. Her assignments are creative and fun.

reviews.subject: Statistics
reviews.review: Prof. Chang is very knowledgeable, but his pacing can be too fast for some students.
